title: HELP
body: can anyone help me with something , something happened out of nowhere, I was playing a game and after the game I went on to play another one and it didn't load and after the champ select it went black and said "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game" and with various different methods I found on the internet and hundreds of times of restarting, reinstalling and updating nothing ever worked. one time after I changed the compatibility settings and it started the game ( I was with bots) then I thought I fixed it and went to play with a friend but when I got into the game it was always "attempting to reconnect" and after I left again it went back where I started and I cant do anything, please help.

replies.body: This error and black screen are commonly symptoms of connection problems failing to connect to the game server, so it can't download assets.  Go over the instructions in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
